name: fav-type.is-finite-number
description: Checks whether a value is a finite number or not.

scripts.web:build: npm run web:build-src && npm run web:build-test
scripts.web:build-src: browserify index.js --standalone fav.type.is-finite-number -o web/fav.type.is-finite-number.js && cd web && uglifyjs fav.type.is-finite-number.js --compress --mangle -o fav.type.is-finite-number.min.js --source-map url=fav.type.is-finite-number.min.js.map
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run coverage && npm run web:build
